definition: to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to expand production/to reproduce on an extended scale

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在擴大對外開放中，要十分注意維護國家經濟安全。

sentences.english: The merchants realized that it was important to expand the clan influence if they wanted to get wealthy.
sentences.chinese: 商人認識到擴大宗族勢力與自身致富有直接的關係。

sentences.english: Viscosity improvers are polymers with molecules that expand when they get hot.
sentences.chinese: 粘度改良劑是聚合物分子，當他們得到擴大熱點。

sentences.english: CNS infections may be associated with brain atrophy, with resultant microcephaly and ventriculomegaly.
sentences.chinese: 有關，伴有小頭畸形和腦室擴大的後果。

sentences.english: If you double the system, they double in there numerical number.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把系統擴大一倍，它們的值也會擴大一倍。

sentences.english: If you double the system, they double in there numerical number.
sentences.chinese: 如果你把系統擴大一倍，它們的值也會擴大一倍。

sentences.english: The next hip-hop dance move is to extend the right foot out.
sentences.chinese: 接下來的嘻哈舞步，是擴大了右腳。

sentences.english: In addition, the arable land area in Wushuihe river basin was correspondently enlarged during the period of the past 15 years.
sentences.chinese: 從土地利用變化來看，舞水河流域耕地面積不斷擴大。

sentences.english: Such bottlenecks have been hampering the opening of new mines and the expansion of existing ones.
sentences.chinese: 這些瓶頸已經妨礙新礦的開發和已有礦產的擴大。

sentences.english: First, the coverage of low-rent housing security should be expanded.
sentences.chinese: 一是擴大廉租住房制度的保障範圍。

sentences.english: Further, other, non-trisomic abnormalities may also demonstrate an enlarged nuchal transparency.
sentences.chinese: 此外，其他非三體異常可能也表明擴大頸部透明度。

sentences.english: Strengthens their exporting ability and speeds their economy forward.
sentences.chinese: 擴大出口能力，加速經濟發展。

sentences.english: Effective measures should be taken to expand and streng…
sentences.chinese: 山東應該採取有效措施擴大和深化對韓貿易。

sentences.english: The float container will expand to encompass all interior float elements.
sentences.chinese: 浮動容器會被擴大以包含所有內部的浮動元素。

sentences.english: Expanded economic exchanges between towns and rural areas can significantly increase farmers' incomes.
sentences.chinese: 擴大城鄉經濟往來有利於明顯增加農民收入。

sentences.english: The expansion of agricultural land is destroying tigers’ habitats and food supply.
sentences.chinese: 農耕用地不斷擴大，破壞了老虎的棲息地和食物來源。

definition: one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
